oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Original wills, Aldrich, Joseph A., 1874 May 28
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An original will of Joseph A. Aldrich, dated March 16th, 1873. Illustrates the first page of the document. Aldrich’s will was presented for probate on May 28th, 1874, recorded in “Min. Book “N” p. 39304, recorded in Book of Wills & Invy. No. 23, Page 211.” Forms part of Record Group 16, Original Wills, 1780-1925.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Aldrich family
